info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:48PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hillsdale County through 900 PM EDT... At 847 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Addison, or 7 miles north of Hudson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy downpours will occur with this storm. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Hillsdale County, including the following locations... North Adams. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
